languages.text: "Кровь всех мучеников..." {n}Взгляд Соломона намертво застыл на изувеченном техножреце.{/n} "Что эти ублюдки с ним сделали?"
"By the blood of all the martyrs..." {n}Solomorne's dead gaze is fixed on the maimed Tech-Priest.{/n} "What have those freaks done to him?"
languages.original_text: "Кровь всех мучеников..." {n}Взгляд Соломона намертво застыл на изувеченном техножреце.{/n} "Что эти ублюдки с ним сделали?"

languages.text: “殉道者的鲜血在上啊……”{n}索罗蒙死死地盯着帕斯卡残损的躯体。{/n}“那些怪物到底对他做了什么？”
languages.original_text: "By the blood of all the martyrs..." {n}Solomorne's dead gaze is fixed on the maimed Tech-Priest.{/n} "What have those freaks done to him?"

traits.locale_text: “殉道者的鲜血在上啊……”{n}索罗蒙死死地盯着帕斯卡残损的躯体。{/n}“那些怪物到底对他做了什么？”

languages.text: «Por la sangre de todos los mártires...». {n}La mirada vacía de Solomorne permanece fija en el tecnosacerdote mutilado.{/n} «¿Qué le han hecho esos monstruos?».
languages.original_text: "By the blood of all the martyrs..." {n}Solomorne's dead gaze is fixed on the maimed Tech-Priest.{/n} "What have those freaks done to him?"

traits.locale_text: «Por la sangre de todos los mártires...». {n}La mirada vacía de Solomorne permanece fija en el tecnosacerdote mutilado.{/n} «¿Qué le han hecho esos monstruos?».

languages.text: « Par le sang de tous les martyrs... {n}Solomorne pose un regard hagard sur le technoprêtre mutilé.{/n} Qu'est-ce que ces monstres lui ont fait ? »
languages.original_text: "By the blood of all the martyrs..." {n}Solomorne's dead gaze is fixed on the maimed Tech-Priest.{/n} "What have those freaks done to him?"

traits.locale_text: « Par le sang de tous les martyrs... {n}Solomorne pose un regard hagard sur le technoprêtre mutilé.{/n} Qu'est-ce que ces monstres lui ont fait ? »

languages.text: 「すべての殉教者の血にかけて…」{n}ソロモーンの虚ろな視線は、傷ついた技術司祭に釘付けになった。{/n}「異常者どもは、彼に何をしたんだ？」
languages.original_text: "By the blood of all the martyrs..." {n}Solomorne's dead gaze is fixed on the maimed Tech-Priest.{/n} "What have those freaks done to him?"

traits.locale_text: 「すべての殉教者の血にかけて…」{n}ソロモーンの虚ろな視線は、傷ついた技術司祭に釘付けになった。{/n}「異常者どもは、彼に何をしたんだ？」

languages.text: "Tüm şehitlerin kanı adına..." {n}Solomorne'un ölü bakışları, yaralı Tekno Rahip'e kilitleniyor.{/n} "Bu deliler ona ne yapmış?"
languages.original_text: "By the blood of all the martyrs..." {n}Solomorne's dead gaze is fixed on the maimed Tech-Priest.{/n} "What have those freaks done to him?"

traits.locale_text: "Tüm şehitlerin kanı adına..." {n}Solomorne'un ölü bakışları yaralı Tekno Rahip'e kilitleniyor.{/n} "Bu deliler ona ne yapmış?"

languages.text: "Beim Blut sämtlicher Märtyrer ..." {n}Solomornes toter Blick ist auf den verstümmelten Techpriester gerichtet.{/n} "Was haben diese Wahnsinnigen mit ihm gemacht?"
languages.original_text: "By the blood of all the martyrs..." {n}Solomorne's dead gaze is fixed on the maimed Tech-Priest.{/n} "What have those freaks done to him?"

traits.locale_text: "Beim Blut sämtlicher Märtyrer ..." {n}Solomornes toter Blick ist auf den verstümmelten Techpriester gerichtet.{/n} "Was haben diese Wahnsinnigen mit ihm gemacht?"
